Entries.default:
A beam of light shines down from the sky above - or rather from the vague emptiness that passes for a sky in the Beyond. 

Pieces of a broken bridge hover, suspended in an instant before collapse.
[Hold Waidwen's sundial up to the light.]
The source of the illumination is too distant, and the effort of looking hurts your eyes.
The sundial grows warm in your palm. You feel its power extend to your surroundings, reconfiguring the flow of time to mend what was once broken.
It reminds you of the holy light cast by Eothas, but it feels diminished here.
You suspect the light is something more than it seems, but that could be true of many things in this realm.
